metadata.title: CVE-2023-37278 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: GLPI is a Free Asset and IT Management Software package, Data centermanagement, ITIL Service Desk, licenses tracking and software auditing. Anadministrator can trigger SQL injection via dashboards administration. Thisvulnerability has been patched in version 10.0.9.

criterions.comment: glpi package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
